sourcesContent:
/** * Main App Component * * This is the root component of the Sizible Fashion Style Advice application. * It sets up routing and global providers. */ import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components'; import theme from './styles/theme'; import GlobalStyles from './styles/GlobalStyles'; import SizibleNavigation from './components/common/SizibleNavigation'; import SizibleButton from './components/common/SizibleButton'; import SizibleCard from './components/common/SizibleCard'; import styled from 'styled-components'; // Styled components for the pages const PageContainer = styled.div` padding: ${props => props.theme.spacing.large}; max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; `; const HeroSection = styled.div` background-color: ${props => props.theme.colors.primary}; color: white; padding: ${props => props.theme.spacing.xlarge}; border-radius: ${props => props.theme.borderRadius.medium}; margin-bottom: ${props => props.theme.spacing.large}; text-align: center; `; const CardGrid = styled.div` display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: ${props => props.theme.spacing.large}; margin-top: ${props => props.theme.spacing.xlarge}; `; // Placeholder pages with Sizible styling const HomePage = () => ( <>

Sizible Fashion Style Advice

Personalized size and style recommendations for fashion retailers and consumers

Get Started

How It Works

For Retailers

Already a Sizible customer? Provide guidance and direction to your customers when they use our sizing tool.

Retailer Login

For Consumers

Receive personalized size recommendations and complementary style suggestions.

Find Your Style

Smart Recommendations

Our AI-powered system translates retailer guidance into personalized recommendations.

Learn More
); const RetailerLoginPage = () => ( <>

Retailer Login

Login
); const RetailerDashboardPage = () => ( <>

Retailer Dashboard

Welcome to your Sizible dashboard. Manage your inventory and style guidance here.

Inventory

Manage your garment inventory

View Inventory

Style Guidance

Provide style advice for your customers

Add Guidance

Analytics

View recommendation performance

View Analytics ); const ConsumerHomePage = () => ( <>

Find Your Perfect Style

Get personalized size and style recommendations from your favorite retailers.

Get Started

Get Recommendations
); const NotFoundPage = () => ( <>

404 - Page Not Found

The page you are looking for does not exist.

Return to Home ); /** * App component - the main application component * * @returns {JSX.Element} The App component */ function App() { return ( {/* Public routes */} } /> {/* Retailer routes */} } /> } /> {/* Consumer routes */} } /> {/* Fallback routes */} } /> } /> ); } export default App;
